name: Busy Day
description:
Busy Day

Can you manage a busy delivery centre as long as possible? In Busy Day, you have to receive packages and send them out for delivery when they're needed.

Manage satisfaction and profit to stay afloat, as you run out of space both physically, and mentally as you try to keep a track of which packages go out for which order!

Controls Action KBD+Mouse Gamepad Move WASD Left Joystick Rotate Camera Q/E LB/RB Pick up/Drop Packages Left Click X Pause/Unpause Esc Start Instructions

[You can read this, or alternatively follow the ingame tutorial]

Pick up and stack boxes to free up the conveyor belt as fast as possible

You know how you forget what's in a box if its been sitting there, lying ignored? After a while you'll forget what colour the packages are untill you get close to them.

If you wait REALLY long, the packages will become unusable!

Keep an eye on the delivery requests which keep popping up every now and then, to know what delivery to make.

Drop the correct boxes at Outgoing to shoot them out for delivery!


Watch out for the satisfaction and profit meters. The more deliveries you complete, the more money and satisfaction you gain. If you let too many delivery requests slip by, the game will end!

Have Fun!
